Title: Adorable Julia
Writer: Guy Bolton (play), Pascal Jardin, Eberhard Keindorff (screenplay), W. Somerset Maugham (story "Theatre"), Marc-Gilbert Sauvajon (play), Johanna Sibelius (screenplay)
Actors: Lilli Palmer, Charles Boyer, Jean Sorel, Jeanne Valérie
Plot: Everybody loves Julia Lambert, she is so charming, she is so elegant, she is so irresistible... But Julia has problems. She is married to Michael, a stage producer, such an understanding ...
